issue.title: ROS does not always shut down cleanly

content.raw:
I think including the proper shutdown procedure for each tutorial would help. Also, we should add a quick tutorial on how to shut down Gazebo in these two instances: 
- Server and client started in separate windows
- roslaunch
content.html: I think including the proper shutdown procedure for each tutorial would help. Also, we should add a quick tutorial on how to shut down Gazebo in these two instances: - Server and client started in separate windows - roslaunch
